singleItemContent: Do you like science classes when you were young?
Do you think school children should have both science classes and art classes?
Do you think science is important to our society?
Describe an exciting book that you enjoy reading
What kind of book it is
And explain why it is exciting
Do you prefer books or movies?
Do you think it is very important to read the book before watching the movie version of it?
Do boys and girls like the same kinds of books?
What kinds of books do Chinese people like reading?
